column1: pdf printable version facts. born: october 19, 1934. place of birth: ranburne, alabama. death: june 9, 2015. place of death: residence. occupation: retired: douglas & lomason. organizations: member: harmony baptist church. survivorsgerylen alewine teague, wife sheila & steve harris, daughter & son-in-law. keith & jeanette teague, son & daughter-in-law. ken & tanya teague, son & daughter-in-law. mildred bradley, sister. larry teague, brother. jessica teague, grandchild. adam mc. donald, grandchild. joshua teague, grandchild. blaze mc. donald, great grandchild. phoenix mc. donald, great grandchild. preceded in death by. george teague, sr., father. emma whitman teague, mother. dot fox, sister. gladys nolan, sister. servicesvisitation. thursday june 11, 2015, 4:00 pm - 8:00 pm at martin & hightower heritage chapel funeral. friday june 12, 2015, 2:00 pm at martin & hightower heritage chapel interment. friday june 12, 2015 at carroll memory gardens memorial networks partner provider: batesville interactive, all rights reserved. funeral home website by batesville, inc. privacy terms of use
